article_title: Tim Moore is state House Republican nominee for speaker
article_text: NC House Republicans on Saturday selected Rep. Tim Moore as their nominee for House speaker, one of the most powerful political positions in state government. The full House will vote in January.

article_metadata.news-keywords: N.C. House, speaker, Tim Moore, Leo Daughtry, selection, legislature, N.C. House Republicans

article_summary:
NC House Republicans on Saturday selected Rep. Tim Moore as their nominee for House speaker, one of the most powerful political positions in state government.
The full House will vote in January.
